name: Free Comic 2017
description: A free mini-comic for Free Comic Book Day 2017 with contributions from Pam Wishbow, James Stanton, Jonathan Bell Wolfe, Lara Kaminoff, Erik Schneider Gutierrez, and Bjorn Daniel Miner.
details: 28 pgs. Blue and Mahagony ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 300.

name: Foreman General: Issue Two
description: Global Mega City Construction strong-arms a deal with the government.
details: 16 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Orange Light. Edition of 50.

name: Cat Claw
description: DJ Cat Claw finds herself in a desperate situation where she must either use her secret powers or see a loved one get hurt.
details: 48 pgs. Mahogany ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Yellow Light. Hand-made record sleeve cover printed with Blue and Mahogany ink on French Paper 65#C Glo-tone Yellow Light. Edition of 50.

name: Foreman General: Issue One
description: A spy infiltrates an enemy construction site.
details: 16 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Orange Light. Edition of 50.

name: Danger! Villainous Monster!
description: Forty tokusatsu villains from shows like Kamen Rider, Barom 1, Himitsu Sentai Gorenger, and Spider-Man.
details: 40 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 100.

name: Handout Comics No. 5
description: The 2016 edition of a free minicomic featuring several Chicago-based artists.
details: 16 pgs. Blue, Yellow, and Red ink covers. Blue ink insides on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 300.

name: Elote Pin
details: 4-Color Soft Enamel Pin

name: Mexican Street Food Print Set
details: Black, Blue, Yellow, and Bright Red faux-CMYK Risograph on French Paper 100#C Contruction Whitewash. Edition of 50.

name: Still Guilty
description: The author as a young boy breaks his mother's discman and he still feels guilty about it.
details: 12 pgs. Black and Mahagony ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 100.

name: Hecho en Mexico
details: Blue and Yellow ink on French Paper 100#C Contruction Whitewash. Edition of 40.

name: Flying Trash
description: A couple of minutes in the life of an average seagull that end up cooler than expected.
details: 28 pgs. Green ink on French Paper 70#T Pop-Tone Banana Split. Edition of 55.

name: Help!
description: Help your community grow, achieve, learn, and build! It's amazing what a helping hand can do.
details: 8 pgs. Black and Mahagony ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 50.

name: The Dead Sound
description: A skeleton band reunites for one last time to play a gig on Halloween night.
details: 16 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 70#T Pop-Tone Lemon Drop and 65#C Pop-Tone Orange Fizz. Edition of 200.

name: Shots
description: A man struggles with regret as he attempts to sink one last free-throw.
details: 16 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 70#T Construction Recycled White and 65#C Pop-Tone Orange Fizz. Edition of 100.

name: Trade-Off
description: An exploration of lighting and tone comparing familiar objects of the city and countryside
details: 16 pgs. Black and blue ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 50.

name: Whitey's Woods
description: A short essay reflecting on the single image the author conjures when he thinks of home.
details: Black, green, and blue ink on French Paper 80#C Construction Whitewash. Edition of 50.

name: Nothing Special
description: A trip to Japan reconnects the author with his family and heritage.
details: 24 pgs. Laminated gold foil adheared to toner on French Paper 80#C Construction Electric Red with black Risograph on general newsprint interiors. Edition of 75.

name: Handout Comics No. 4
description: The 2015 edition of a free minicomic featuring several local artists.
details: 32 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper Aged. Edition of 300.

name: Nordhouse
description: Three friends meet for a camping trip at the Nordhouse Dunes in western Michigan where drinking leads to quiet moments of self-reflection and comradery.
details: 48 pgs. Blue and green ink on French Paper 70#T and 80#C Construction Whitewash. Edition of 100.

name: To-Do
description: An organized vigilante uses his skills in project managment to out-plan a criminal.
details: 28 pgs. Blue and black ink on French Paper 80#C Construction Whitewash and one color black Risograph interiors on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 80.
